details.title: Radar automatic target recognition using complex high-resolution range profiles

authors.affiliation: Nat. Lab. of Radar Signal Process., Xidian Univ., Xi'an
authors.name: L. Du

authors.affiliation: Nat. Lab. of Radar Signal Process., Xidian Univ., Xi'an
authors.name: H. Liu

authors.affiliation: Nat. Lab. of Radar Signal Process., Xidian Univ., Xi'an
authors.name: Z. Bao

authors.affiliation: Nat. Lab. of Radar Signal Process., Xidian Univ., Xi'an
authors.name: J. Zhang

details.abstract: Radar high-resolution range profile (HRRP) has received intensive attention from the radar automatic target recognition (RATR) community. Usually, since the initial phase of a complex HRRP is strongly sensitive to target position variation, only the amplitude information in complex HRRPs is used for RATR, whereas the phase information is discarded. However, the remaining phase information except for initial phases in complex HRRPs may also contain valuable target discriminant information. RATR using complex HRRPs is discussed. The complex HRRPs' feature subspace within each target-aspect sector is extracted via principal component analysis as the corresponding template during the training phase; while in the test phase we decide that a test sample belongs to the feature subspace which has the test sample's minimum reconstruction error approximation. It is shown that the whole process is independent of the initial phases, but exploits the remaining phase information in complex HRRPs. Furthermore, to make the proposed recognition method more practical, a fast time-shift compensation algorithm is proposed. In the recognition experiments based on measured data, the proposed recognition method using complex HRRPs achieves better recognition results than that using only the amplitude vectors of the complex HRRPs

ieee.title: High-Resolution Range Profile Deception Method Based on Phase-Switched Screen
ieee.displayText: Letao Xu, Dejun Feng, Ran Zhang, Xuesong Wang, "High-Resolution Range Profile Deception Method Based on Phase-Switched Screen", Antennas and Wireless Propagation Letters IEEE, vol. 15, pp. 1665-1668, 2016, ISSN 1536-1225.

ieee.title: Non-Cooperative Target Identification based on Singular Value Decomposition
ieee.displayText: Olga Hernán-Vega, Patricia López-Rodríguez, David Escot-Bocanegra, Raúl Fernández-Recio, Ignacio Bravo, "Non-Cooperative Target Identification based on Singular Value Decomposition", Radar Symposium (IRS) 2015 16th International, pp. 882-887, 2015.

ieee.title: Noise Robust Radar HRRP Target Recognition Based on Multitask Factor Analysis With Small Training Data Size
ieee.displayText: Lan Du, Hongwei Liu, Penghui Wang, Bo Feng, Mian Pan, Zheng Bao, "Noise Robust Radar HRRP Target Recognition Based on Multitask Factor Analysis With Small Training Data Size", Signal Processing IEEE Transactions on, vol. 60, pp. 3546-3559, 2012, ISSN 1053-587X.

ieee.title: Radar HRRP Statistical Recognition: Parametric Model and Model Selection
ieee.displayText: Lan Du, Hongwei Liu, Zheng Bao, "Radar HRRP Statistical Recognition: Parametric Model and Model Selection", Signal Processing IEEE Transactions on, vol. 56, pp. 1931-1944, 2008, ISSN 1053-587X.

ieee.title: Multitask factor analysis with application to noise robust radar HRRP target recognition
ieee.displayText: Lan Du, Hongwei Liu, Penghui Wang, Bo Feng, Mian Pan, Zheng Bao, "Multitask factor analysis with application to noise robust radar HRRP target recognition", Radar Conference (RADAR) 2012 IEEE, pp. 0202-0207, 2012, ISSN 1097-5659.

ieee.title: Multi-Sensor Fusion and Fault Detection using Hybrid Estimation for Air Traffic Surveillance
ieee.displayText: Weiyi Liu, Jian Wei, Mengchen Liang, Yi Cao, Inseok Hwang, "Multi-Sensor Fusion and Fault Detection using Hybrid Estimation for Air Traffic Surveillance", Aerospace and Electronic Systems IEEE Transactions on, vol. 49, pp. 2323-2339, 2013, ISSN 0018-9251.

ieee.title: Radar HRRP target recognition based on K-SVD algorithm
ieee.displayText: Bo Feng, Lan Du, Hong-wei Liu, Fei Li, "Radar HRRP target recognition based on K-SVD algorithm", Radar (Radar) 2011 IEEE CIE International Conference on, vol. 1, pp. 642-645, 2011.

ieee.title: Range Profile Analysis of the 2-D Target Above a Rough Surface Based on the Electromagnetic Numerical Simulation
ieee.displayText: Si-Yuan He, Fang-Shun Deng, Hai-Tao Chen, Wen-Xian Yu, Wei-Dong Hu, Guo-Qiang Zhu, "Range Profile Analysis of the 2-D Target Above a Rough Surface Based on the Electromagnetic Numerical Simulation", Antennas and Propagation IEEE Transactions on, vol. 57, pp. 3258-3263, 2009, ISSN 0018-926X.

ieee.title: Point scatterer modeling of complex targets
ieee.displayText: Seung Ho Doo, Graeme Smith, Chris Baker, "Point scatterer modeling of complex targets", Radar Conference (Radar) 2014 International, pp. 1-6, 2014.

ieee.title: A new radar target recognition method based on complex high resolution range profiles
ieee.displayText: Lei Chen, Rushan Chen, "A new radar target recognition method based on complex high resolution range profiles", Microwave and Millimeter Wave Technology (ICMMT) 2012 International Conference on, vol. 2, pp. 1-4, 2012.
